text: Episode 1

Once upon a time in New York City there lived a community of fairy tale characters known as Fabletown.The Fables who live there arrived hundreds of years ago, after they were exiled from their Homelands
Through the use of a magic spell called Glamour, they have protected their secret community from the mundane world.
Sheriff Bigby Wolf protects them from each other.

speaker: Radio_announcer
text: 105 today if you missed it, a record for the day, hottest ever in June, 103 now, and that humidity looks low, but remember the hotter the air is, the more moisture it can hold, so 103 with 31% humidity is a lot more humid than, say, 73 with 31% humidity and it is muggy out there.
Tenement Building
South Bronx
Sometime after midnight...
Toad's/254 Barretto St The Bronx

speaker: bigby
text: Mr. Toad?

speaker: toad
text: Oh shit

speaker: toad
text: Bigby! Listen, mate

speaker: toad
text: I know I don't look human

speaker: toad
text: It's a problem, I get it, I just stepped out the apartment for just a second to see what kind of damage this drunk shit is doing.

speaker: toad
text: Just cut me a break, yeah? I'll get me glamour first thing in the morning.

speaker: toad
text: Cross my heart

speaker: toad
text: No need to kick up a fuss

speaker: bigby
text: I'm looking at a 3 foot toad.

speaker: bigby
text: In a sweater... That's a problem.

speaker: bigby
text: If you can't afford to look human, you're going to The Farm.

speaker: bigby
text: It's as simple as that.

speaker: toad
text: You can't send me up to live with those animals…

speaker: toad
text: You know what I mean

speaker: bigby
text: Go see a witch. Get a glamour.

speaker: toad
text: Bigby, they're bleedin' me dry, mate. The quality of the spell goes down, but the rates keep climbing up.

speaker: toad
text: Do you have any idea how much it costs to have an entire family in glamour?

speaker: bigby
text: Get it fixed. It's not complicated, Toad.

speaker: bigby
text: Whatever it costs, it's worth it.

speaker: bigby
text: You don't..

speaker: bigby
text: ..want me catching you out of glamour again.

speaker: Woodsman
text: Fuckin' hell

speaker: toad
text: See? This is what I called you about, Sheriff.

speaker: toad
text: You just gonna stand there?

speaker: toad
text: Do something, Bigby.

speaker: toad
text: Before he completely tears up the place.

speaker: bigby
text: And what exactly do you want me to do?

speaker: toad
text: I want you to throw the fuckin' Woodsman out of here. Drunk shit… He's been going on like that for hours. Turn..

speaker: toad
text: ..this place to dust if you let him. He's in a fuckin' rage.

speaker: Woodsman
text: <grunt>

speaker: toad
text: This is the..

speaker: toad
text: last straw, Bigby. He has to go!

speaker: bigby
text: So, what set him off?

speaker: toad
text: Who knows what it was this time. Man's got a hair trigger. I avoid him as much as possible.

speaker: bigby
text: When did he start drinking?

speaker: toad
text: Not sure he ever stopped.

speaker: Faith
text: [Crash] Fuck you.

speaker: toad
text: I didn't know anyone else was up there.

speaker: toad
text: Furry pricked gobshite… tell me how to spend my money… <spit>

speaker: Toad's child
text: Dad? The..

speaker: Toad's child
text: lights are shaking again…

speaker: toad
text: What'd I say? You want..

speaker: toad
text: the Big Bad Wolf to take you away?

speaker: Toad's child
text: No.

speaker: toad
text: Then get the fuck back inside.
